00118 
00119 template <size_t Bits> const size_t fixed_integer<Bits>::_c_digits =
00120     (Bits + detail::bits_per_digit - 1) / detail::bits_per_digit;
00121 template <size_t Bits> const detail::digit_t fixed_integer<Bits>::_c_mask =
00122     ((Bits % detail::bits_per_digit) == 0) ? detail::digit_mask
00123     : ((detail::digit_t(1) << (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)) - 1);
00124 template <size_t Bits> boost::shared_ptr<detail::data_t>
00125     fixed_integer<Bits>::preallocated_zero(detail::allocate_fixed_zero(
00126     fixed_integer<Bits>::_c_mask, fixed_integer<Bits>::_c_digits),
00127     detail::deallocate);

00246 #define BOOST_XINT_NFIXED typename boost::disable_if<boost::is_base_of<\
00247     fixed_integer_any, T>, fixed_integer<Bits> >::type
00248 
00249 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_BINARY_FN(name, body) \
00250 template <size_t Bits> \
00251 fixed_integer<Bits> name(const fixed_integer<Bits>& op1, \
00252     const fixed_integer<Bits>& op2) \
00253 { \
00254     fixed_integer<Bits> r; \
00255     body(r, op1, op2); \
00256     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00257 } \
00258 \
00259 template <size_t Bits, typename T> \
00260 BOOST_XINT_NFIXED name(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n1, const T& n2) { \
00261     fixed_integer<Bits> r; \
00262     body(r, n1, fixed_integer_any(n2)); \
00263     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00264 } \
00265 \
00266 template <typename T, size_t Bits> \
00267 BOOST_XINT_NFIXED name(const T& n1, const fixed_integer<Bits>& n2) { \
00268     fixed_integer<Bits> r; \
00269     body(r, fixed_integer_any(n1), n2); \
00270     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00271 }

00402 template <size_t Bits>
00403 bool fixed_integer<Bits>::odd() const {
00404     return (_get_digit(0) & 0x01) != 0;
00405 }
00406 
00408 template <size_t Bits>
00409 bool fixed_integer<Bits>::even() const {
00410     return (_get_digit(0) & 0x01) == 0;
00411 }
00412 
00414 template <size_t Bits>
00415 int fixed_integer<Bits>::sign(bool signed_zero) const {
00416     if (!signed_zero && _is_zero()) return 0;
00417     else return (_get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00418 }
00419 
00421 template <size_t Bits>
00422 size_t fixed_integer<Bits>::hex_digits() const {
00423     size_t bits=_log2();
00424     return (bits+3)/4; // Four bits per hex digit, rounded up
00425 }
00426 
00432 template <size_t Bits>
00433 fixed_integer<Bits> fixed_integer<Bits>::operator~() const {
00434     fixed_integer<Bits> r(*this);
00435     r._make_unique();
00436     detail::digit_t *p = r._get_writable_digits(), *pe1 = p + r._get_length(),
00437         *pe2 = p + _c_digits;
00438     while (p != pe1) { *p = ~(*p); ++p; }
00439     while (p != pe2) *p++ = detail::digit_mask;
00440     r._set_length(_c_digits);
00441     r._cleanup();
00442     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00443 }

00447 fixed_integer<Bits>& fixed_integer<Bits>::name(const fixed_integer_any& n) { \
00448     body(*this, *this, n); \
00449     return *this; \
00450 }

00459 fixed_integer<Bits>& fixed_integer<Bits>::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00460     detail::shift_left(*this, *this, shift);

00470 template <size_t Bits>
00471 fixed_integer<Bits> fixed_integer<Bits>::operator<<(size_t shift) const {
00472     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00473     detail::shift_left(r, *this, shift);
00474     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00475 }

00478 fixed_integer<Bits> fixed_integer<Bits>::operator>>(size_t shift) const {
00479     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00480     detail::shift_right(r, *this, shift);
00481     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00514 template <size_t Bits>
00515 fixed_integer<Bits> abs(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n) {
00516     if (n._get_negative()) {
00517         fixed_integer<Bits> r(n);
00518         r._set_negative(false);
00519         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00520     } else return n;
00521 }
00522 
00524 template <size_t Bits>
00525 fixed_integer<Bits> negate(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n) {
00526     fixed_integer<Bits> r(n);
00527     r._set_negative(!r._get_negative());
00528     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00529 }

00562 template <size_t Bits>
00563 fixed_integer<Bits> divide(const fixed_integer<Bits>& dividend,
00564     const fixed_integer<Bits>& divisor)
00565 {
00566     fixed_integer<Bits> q, r;
00567     detail::divide(q, r, dividend, divisor);
00568     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q);

00572 template <size_t Bits>
00573 typename fixed_integer<Bits>::divide_t divide_r(const fixed_integer<Bits>&
00574     dividend, const fixed_integer<Bits>& divisor)
00575 {
00576     fixed_integer<Bits> q, r;
00577     detail::divide(q, r, dividend, divisor);
00578     return BOOST_XINT_FORWARD(fixed_integer<Bits>::divide_t,
00579         fixed_integer<Bits>::divide_t(BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q), BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r)));
00580 }

00715 template <size_t Bits>
00716 fixed_integer<Bits> shift(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, int byBits) {
00717     return (byBits < 0 ? shift_right(n, -byBits) : shift_left(n, byBits));
00718 }

00721 template <size_t Bits>
00722 fixed_integer<Bits> shift_left(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, size_t byBits) {
00723     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00724     detail::shift_left(r, n, byBits);
00725     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00726 }
00727 
00729 template <size_t Bits>
00730 fixed_integer<Bits> shift_right(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, size_t byBits) {
00731     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00732     detail::shift_right(r, n, byBits);
00733     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00734 }
00735 
00736 template <size_t Bits>
00737 fixed_integer<Bits> mod(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, const fixed_integer<Bits>&
00738     m)
00739 {
00740     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00741     detail::mod(r, n, m);
00742     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00743 }
00744 
00746 template <size_t Bits>
00747 fixed_integer<Bits> mulmod(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, const
00748     fixed_integer<Bits>& by, const fixed_integer<Bits>& m)
00749 {
00750     return mod(n * by, m);
00751 }
00752 
00754 template <size_t Bits>
00755 fixed_integer<Bits> sqrmod(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, const
00756     fixed_integer<Bits>& m)
00757 {
00758     return mod(sqr(n), m);
00759 }
00760 
00762 template <size_t Bits>
00763 fixed_integer<Bits> powmod(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, const
00764     fixed_integer<Bits>& e, const fixed_integer<Bits>& m, bool noMontgomery)
00765 {
00766     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00767     detail::powmod(r, n, e, m, noMontgomery);
00768     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00769 }
00770 
00772 template <size_t Bits>
00773 fixed_integer<Bits> invmod(const fixed_integer<Bits>& n, const
00774     fixed_integer<Bits>& m)
00775 {
00776     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00777     detail::invmod(r, n, m);
00778     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00779 }
00780 
00782 template <size_t Bits>
00783 fixed_integer<Bits> fixed_random_by_size(size_t bits, bool high_bit_on, bool
00784     low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00785 {
00786     return fixed_integer<Bits>(random_by_size((std::min)(Bits, bits),
00787         high_bit_on, low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
00788 }
00789 
00791 template <size_t Bits>
00792 fixed_integer<Bits> fixed_random_prime(size_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback)
00793 {
00794     fixed_integer<Bits> r(random_prime((std::min)(Bits, size_in_bits), callback));
00795     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00796 }
00797 
00799 template <size_t Bits>
00800 fixed_integer<Bits> gcd(const fixed_integer<Bits>& num1, const
00801     fixed_integer<Bits>& num2)
00802 {
00803     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00804     detail::gcd(r, num1, num2);
00805     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00806 }
00807 
00809 template <size_t Bits>
00810 fixed_integer<Bits> lcm(const fixed_integer<Bits>& num1, const
00811     fixed_integer<Bits>& num2)
00812 {
00813     fixed_integer<Bits> r;
00814     detail::lcm(r, num1, num2);
00815     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00816 }
00817 
00820 template <typename charT, typename traits, size_t Bits>
00821 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00822     traits>& out, const fixed_integer<Bits>& n)
00823 {
00824     return detail::operator<<(out, n);
00825 }
00826 
00827 template <typename charT, typename traits, size_t Bits>
00828 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00829     traits>& in, fixed_integer<Bits>& n)
00830 {
00831     return detail::operator>>(in, n);
00832 }
00834 
00835 // No 100% compatible way to declare a specialization of a function template
00836 // using a templated class, as far as I can tell. This is the second-best
00837 // solution.
00838 template<size_t Bits>
00839 void swap(fixed_integer<Bits>& left, fixed_integer<Bits>& right) {
00840     left._swap(right);
00841 }

00846 namespace std {
00847 
00848 template<size_t Bits>
00849 class numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> > {
00850     public:
00851     static const bool is_specialized = true;
00852 
00853     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> min() throw() { return
00854         -~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits>()); }
00855     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> max() throw() { return
00856         ~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits>()); }
00857 
00858     static const int digits = Bits;
00859     static const int digits10; // = boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits>::_c_log10;
00860     static const bool is_signed = true;
00861     static const bool is_integer = true;
00862     static const bool is_exact = true;
00863     static const int radix = 2;
00864     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> epsilon() throw() { return 0; }
00865     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> round_error() throw() { return 0; }
00866 
00867     static const int min_exponent = 0; // Not applicable
00868     static const int min_exponent10 = 0; // Not applicable
00869     static const int max_exponent = 0; // Not applicable
00870     static const int max_exponent10 = 0; // Not applicable
00871 
00872     static const bool has_infinity = false;
00873     static const bool has_quiet_NaN = false;
00874     static const bool has_signaling_NaN = false;
00875     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm = denorm_absent; // Not applicable
00876     static const bool has_denorm_loss = false; // Not applicable
00877 
00878     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> infinity() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
00879     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
00880     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
00881     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
00882 
00883     static const bool is_iec559 = false;
00884     static const bool is_bounded = true;
00885     static const bool is_modulo = true;
00886 
00887     static const bool traps = true; // I assume this means exceptions?
00888     static const bool tinyness_before = false; // Not applicable
00889     static const float_round_style round_style = round_indeterminate; // Not applicable
00890 };
00891 
00892 template<size_t Bits>
00893 const int numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits> >::digits10 =
00894     static_cast<int>(boost::xint::detail::log10_bits(Bits));
